title: Rank magnitude of charge using electric field map

content.description:
Refer to the material below to answer the following questions:

The figure above shows the electric field in a region surrounding four charged particles, labeled 1, 2, 3, and 4, that are held in place. (Vectors with very large magnitude are not shown.)
content.question: Which of the following indicates the particles with charges of the greatest and the least magnitude?

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
